structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.catch_line: Acceptance of donations of roads and driveways to churches, cemeteries and schools.
law.text: All counties may accept donations in fee to roads and driveways used by the public in connection with churches, cemeteries and public school buildings. After such acceptance by any county, such roads and driveways shall become a part of the county road system and may be constructed, reconstructed and maintained in accordance with existing law.
